name: Merge Party
description:
Let’s Get This Party Started!

Welcome to Merge Party! The brand new Merge game where it’s up to you to build the best party possible!

Merge fun items and make new ones! Use the items you create to plan fantastic parties, or challenge yourself to discover all the items in the game.

Uncover an Exciting Story!

Help budding party planner, Penny, as she puts together incredible parties. Meet her wacky clients, and discover their story as you renovate and decorate to make their dream come true!

From a sunset beach, to a spooky mansion, from a farm yard to the big city, take a journey to new places as Penny’s adventure unfolds.

A Challenging and Relaxing Puzzle

Use strategy to manage and merge your items to find the ones you need, or relax and zone out as you merge to clear the board.

Do you have any questions about the game? Contact us at mergeparty-support@tripledotstudios.com
